sub: A space for the restless ones. Where code, art, and AI crash into each other and something new sparks.

methodologies.title: Contextual Design
methodologies.description: We start from what's around us — our stories, materials, surroundings.

methodologies.title: Popular Education
methodologies.description: Everyone's a teacher, everyone's a learner. Curiosity is the curriculum.

methodologies.title: Radical Data
methodologies.description: Follow your sparks; prototype to test the impossible.

aboutContent: No grades. No gurus. Just ideas, experiments, and the people wild enough to try them. Make weird things. Break boring things. Learn by doing — and unlearning.
headline: Creando Spark
location: Brenchies Lab (University of Aruba) in Oranjestad.
schedule: Join us for 3 creative Saturday sessions where we'll play with coding, AI, communication networks, and digital design — no boring lectures, no prior experience needed. We learn by asking questions, using our own culture and experiences as the starting point, and working together as a community.
language: Sessions in English, with support in Papiamento and Spanish.

faqs.question: Who can join?
faqs.answer: Young people aged 12–18, based in Aruba.

faqs.question: Where are sessions held?
faqs.answer: All sessions happen at RAA! in Oranjestad.

faqs.question: How do I join?
faqs.answer: Message us on WhatsApp to start the process.

team: Co-hosted by Radical Data, Plataforma Aruba, Metabolic Foundation, Counter/Narratives & Afaina de Jong. See partners →
applicationInfo: Ready to join? Message us on WhatsApp to start the process. We'll guide you through joining and answer any questions you have.
